Mystifying Lights.name: Mystifying Lights
Mystifying Lights.flavor: You become a whirl of insects, glowing with a supernatural light that mesmerizes creatures before you.
Mystifying Lights.onHit: 2d6 + Wisdom modifier psychic damage, and you slide the target 1 square. The target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Mystifying Lights.effect: You shift 1 square for each target you hit.

Brilliant Swarm.name: Brilliant Swarm
Brilliant Swarm.flavor: Blinding light flashes around you as glowing insects swarm over your foes.
Brilliant Swarm.attack: Wisdom vs. Fortitude, Reflex, Will. You make one attack roll per target, comparing the result against all three defenses. A target suffers the effects associated with each defense that the attack hits.
Brilliant Swarm.onHit (Fortitude): The target takes ongoing 10 radiant damage (save ends).
Brilliant Swarm.onHit (Any): The target takes 1d8 + your Wisdom modifier radiant damage for each of its defenses that the attack hits.

Light of Clarity.name: Light of Clarity
Light of Clarity.flavor: Primal light fills the air around you, revealing hidden creatures.
Light of Clarity.effect: The burst creates a zone of bright light that lasts until the end of your next turn. Any creature within the zone can’t gain concealment or total concealment, and any creature that starts its turn within the zone can’t gain concealment or total concealment until the end of its next turn.
Light of Clarity.special: You can use this power while you are in beast form.
